title: Tabs Block Theme Configuration
description: Complete theme and appearance configuration for Tabs blocks

groups.title: Header Borders
groups.description: Tab header borders and active edge

tabsHorizontalAlign.label: Block Horizontal Alignment
tabsHorizontalAlign.description: Horizontal alignment of the tabs block

activationMode.label: Activation Mode
activationMode.description: How tabs are activated (click or hover)

tabs.label: Tabs
tabs.description: Array of tab items with title, content, and state

tabsData.label: Tabs Data
tabsData.description: Synchronized tab button data for server-side rendering

borderColor.label: Block Border Color
borderColor.description: Border color for main tabs wrapper

shadowHover.label: Block Hover Shadow
shadowHover.description: Box shadow for wrapper on hover

tabButtonPadding.label: Header Padding
tabButtonPadding.description: Padding for tab buttons in rem (vertical/horizontal will be computed)

tabButtonActiveFontWeight.label: Header Active Font Weight
tabButtonActiveFontWeight.description: Font weight for active/selected tab button

tabButtonBorderColor.label: Header Border Color
tabButtonBorderColor.description: Border color for inactive tab buttons

tabButtonActiveBorderColor.label: Header Active Border Color
tabButtonActiveBorderColor.description: Border color for the active tab

tabButtonShadowHover.label: Header Hover Shadow
tabButtonShadowHover.description: Box shadow for tab buttons on hover

enableFocusBorder.label: Enable Button / Content Border
enableFocusBorder.description: Border on the edge touching the content, giving it a merged look.

tabButtonActiveContentBorderColor.label: Active Content Edge Border Color
tabButtonActiveContentBorderColor.description: Color of the border. Keep it the same color as panel background for a merged look.

tabButtonActiveContentBorderWidth.label: Active Content Edge Border Width
tabButtonActiveContentBorderWidth.description: Width of the active button edge touching content

tabButtonActiveContentBorderStyle.label: Active Content Edge Border Style
tabButtonActiveContentBorderStyle.description: Style of the active button edge touching content

tabListBackgroundColor.label: Row Background
tabListBackgroundColor.description: Background color for the tab navigation bar

tabsRowBorderColor.label: Row Border Color
tabsRowBorderColor.description: Border color for the tab row

tabsRowBorderWidth.label: Row Border Width
tabsRowBorderWidth.description: Border width for the tab row

tabsRowBorderStyle.label: Row Border Style
tabsRowBorderStyle.description: Border style for the tab row

stretchButtonsToRow.label: Stretch Buttons to Row Width
stretchButtonsToRow.description: Make tab buttons fill the full width of the row (horizontal orientation only)

tabListAlignment.label: Header Row Alignment
tabListAlignment.description: Alignment of tabs along the main axis

enableTabsListContentBorder.label: Enable Row Divider Border
enableTabsListContentBorder.description: Enable or disable border between tab row and content

tabsListContentBorderColor.label: Row Divider Border Color
tabsListContentBorderColor.description: Color of the tab row edge that touches the content

tabsListContentBorderWidth.label: Row Divider Border Width
tabsListContentBorderWidth.description: Width of the tab row edge that touches the content

tabsListContentBorderStyle.label: Row Divider Border Style
tabsListContentBorderStyle.description: Style of the tab row edge that touches the content

panelBorderColor.label: Panel Border Color
panelBorderColor.description: Border color for tab content panel

panelBorderWidth.label: Panel Border Width
panelBorderWidth.description: Border width for tab content panel (0-10px)

panelBorderStyle.label: Panel Border Style
panelBorderStyle.description: Border style for tab content panel

panelBorderRadius.label: Panel Border Radius
panelBorderRadius.description: Corner radius for tab content panel

tab-icon-use-different-icons.label: Different Icons for Open/Close
tab-icon-use-different-icons.description: Use different icons for open and closed states

tab-icon-position.label: Icon Position
tab-icon-position.description: Position of the icon relative to title

tab-icon-animation-rotation.label: Animation Rotation
tab-icon-animation-rotation.description: Rotation delta added when the accordion opens

tab-icon-initial-rotation.label: Initial Rotation
tab-icon-initial-rotation.description: Rotation applied before animation for the inactive icon

cssValueByDevice.mobile: translate(var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-mobile, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x))), var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-mobile, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y)))) rotate(var(--tabs-icon-initial-rotation))

tab-icon-initial-rotation-is-open.label: Initial Rotation (Open)
tab-icon-initial-rotation-is-open.description: Rotation applied before animation for the is-open icon

cssValueByDevice.tablet: translate(var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-is-open-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-is-open, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x)))), var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-is-open-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-is-open, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y))))) rotate(calc(var(--tabs-icon-initial-rotation-is-open, var(--tabs-icon-initial-rotation)) + var(--tabs-icon-animation-rotation)))
cssValueByDevice.mobile: translate(var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-is-open-mobile, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-is-open-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-is-open, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-mobile, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-x)))))), var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-is-open-mobile, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-is-open-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-is-open, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-mobile, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y-tablet, var(--tabs-icon-offset-y))))))) rotate(calc(var(--tabs-icon-initial-rotation-is-open, var(--tabs-icon-initial-rotation)) + var(--tabs-icon-animation-rotation)))

headerBorders.title: Header Borders
headerBorders.description: Tab header borders and active edge

Instructions

Template syntax:
- data-el defines the element id used by the generator.
- class defines the selector (first class is the selector).
